posts.description:
خلى الـ White board دايما معاك فى اى حتة :) 

الواحد لما بيكون قاعد فى المكتب و قدامة الـ Board مكتوب عليها كلام كتير و ملزوق ستيكى نوتس كتير عليها بتحس إن إنت حققت إنجازات و إنك بتشتغل بقى ووراك هم ما يتلم :D بس المشكلة إن البورد دى موجودة فى المكتب بس يعنى لو إنت فى الشارع و عاوز تشوف ايه اللى ناقصك او ايه اللى إنت عملته مش هتعرف يا اما ترجع المكتب و تشوف :) 

الموضوع دا يهم كل واحد من واحد عادى لواحد شغال فرى لانسر حتى مدير الشركة. ودا لإن كل واحد مننا وراه كل يوم حاجات لازم يعملها ولو على المستوى الشخصى او العملى. 

فعشان كدا إحنا عن تجربة بنرشح إنكوا تستخدموا Trello عشان تقدروا تنظموا من خلاله اليوم بتاعكوا. اكيد معظمكوا إن مكنش كلكوا عارفينه بس مش كتير بيستخدموه.

Trello ببساطة هو عبارة عن Board تقدر تقسمها لكذا قايمة و كل قايمة بتدل على حاجة معينة. ميزة Trello إنه بسيط فى التعامل و الشكل و إنه معاك فى كل حتة لإن ليه موبايل ابليكيشن (لازم تنزلوه على فكرة :) ) فبكدا تقدر متنساش اى حاجة وراك.

كل الكلام اللى فوق دا عادى و الهدف منه فى إننا نخليكوا تحولوا لحاجة بسيطة تقدر تسهل عليكوا اليوم بتاعكوا. بس فيه حاجة مهمة اللى هى اصلا هدف البوست الأساسى و هى:-

  إن فيه 4 حاجات لازم يكونوا فى التاسك بتاعتك على Trello او اى اداة تانية انت بتستخدمها عشان تعلى الـProductivity بتاعتك :-

1-لازم تحط Due Date او Deadline للتاسك دى.
2-ﻷازم تحط عنوان مفهوم للتاسك ليك او للتيم اللى شغال معاك.
3-لازم تحط وصف للتاسك دى تفصيلى عشان تعرف تفاصيل اكتر عنها بعدين.
4-لو فيه حد شغال معاك فى التيم لازم تحط مين هما الاعضاء اللى شغالين معاك فى التاسك دى. 

نصيحة: لو بتستخدم اى اداة لتنظيم يومك يبقى من الأفضل إنك تجهز خطة اليوم قبلها بيوم :) 

قولولنا كنتوا بتنظموا يومكوا ازاى؟ ولو كنتوا بتستخدموا أداة قولولنا ايه هى ؟

posts.message:
من فترة وأنا أعمل على برمجة سكربت CMS لإدارة المواقع الرسمية ومواقع الشركات بحيث يكون سهل الاستخدام وتقدر أى شركة/شخص بكل سهوله إنها تستخدمه فى إنشاء موقعها و التحكم فى المحتوى 

السكربت كان صدر منه إصدارين 1 , 2 و الحمد لله كان عليه اقبال كويس الفترة اللى فاتت و لكن أنا كنت غير راضى عن برمجته لأنه لم يكن متقن و لم تكن فيه إمكانيات كثيره , لذلك بدأت من الصفر و اليوم وصلت للإصدار  3.0 ولكنها Beta

عملت لنفسى Tasklist لكل إمكانية أو إضافة تيجى على بالى لكى أضعها فى الحسبان أثناء التطوير
http://notedn.com/tasks/331

و دا رابط الإصدار Beta :
http://khashabawy.com/company_script/

ودى  لوحة التحكم :
http://khashabawy.com/company_script/admin.php
username : admin
password : password
pincode : 123456

أنا بستأذنكم بواقع خبرتكم فى مجال ال UI تجربة الموقع و اخبارى عن رأيكم و النصائح و الإقتراحات الأساسية التى تنقص السكربت ...

thanks in advance

You can use reminders and categories to remember your notes and organize them. You also can use to-do lists to organize…

posts.message:
Howdy geeks ..

I have been thinking about a good introductory paragraph entry to start with , but i wasn't satisfied with any of the entries i came up with so i decided not to waste your time and get straight to the point .. 

Am not sure if such a post fits in this group or not , but i will really appreciate ur help.

Currently am in the 3rd grade in the Faculty of Computers and information system - Assuit university , and i have been struggling for a while trying to determine what specific field should i focus on and what specific skills should i enhance to land a job ASAP (Which is at least as soon as i graduate).

I have already tried quite some stuff , Lead the first team to join the ACM-ACPC annual contest from my university , We did pretty well as no training was provided , We were totally self-dependent (We beat the AUC,GUC beginners team though , Am sure we could have done better).

Anyways i have also tried to get my hands dirty working with some technologies , developed some java desktop applications , did some Web-Development in native php also used some micro-frameworks and worked a lil with (codeigniter and laravel) , Thanks to Alaa as he truly helped me a lot.

Using technologies is fun when everything works out pretty well , but it's pretty boring compared to abstract problem solving , specially optimization problems and AI..

Currently am getting used to the .NET framework , Working on a timetabling software for my faculty's semester timetables , In which am learning new AI techniques that i wasn't familiar with before (Ant colony optimization - Genetic algorithms - Graph coloring etc .. ) and also learning more about the .NET framework and C# (as i have chosen it to be the language am using for developing application for the .NET framework) .

So the problem is i really almost got no clue about what are the requirements of current employers and what should i do to land a job more quickly , Specially landing a job that isn't boring that it's only about implementing stuff for a specific framework or platform with no much thinking or problem solving involved , it would be just about getting used to that specific technology and acquiring more knowledge about flaws that might occur and bugs/problems that might show up later , Which is quite boring i guess. 

I really want to describe the position where am currently standing right now so you guys could provide the most efficient tips , but i guess that won't be easy right , Also i don't want to waste your time anymore ..

So in a nutshell what do you guys think i should be doing for the next couple of years before graduating taking in consideration that i might want to land an internship next summer , Thanks A LOT in advance , I totally totally appreciate your help , Sorry again for wasting your time.

posts.caption: espadrine.github.io
posts.description: map, set: let m = new Map(); m.set(key, value); m.has(key); m.get(key). Also has .clear(), .delete(), .forEach(), .keys().

posts.message:
Geeks after start using Mac OS X and start my development using Python and Django, I'm feeling like I took the red bill and I'm out of the matrix, I'm feeling I'm doing everything by myself  no more next next and wizards to get things done for me, now I'm living inside the Terminal.
In nutshell I love this and this will be my primary development platform, I'm not saying I'll leave .NET and Windows but I love Unix systems and Python.

posts.caption: google.com
posts.description: The new reCAPTCHA is here. A significant number of your users can now attest they are human without having to solve a CAPTCHA. Instead with just a single click they’ll confirm they are not a robot. We’re calling it the No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA experience. See blog for more details.
